list.abs: 反向斜视(antipodean squint)是一种罕见的特殊类型斜视,在同一眼上,眼球有时内斜,有时外斜;或当一眼注视时另眼内斜,而另眼注视时,该眼反而外斜,此种特异的.

entry.def: Antipodean describes people or things that come from or relate to Australia and New Zealand.

example.ex: This New Zealand winery produces some of the best antipodean wines.
example.tran: 这家新西兰酿酒厂出产一些最好的澳新葡萄酒。

means.word_mean: 1. relating to the antipodes or situated at opposite sides of the earth;

auth_sentence.content: The Kiwis take all the credit for Antipodean anti-Pom feelings.

auth_sentence.content: It is seen most obviously in the prime ministership of John Howard, her antipodean ideological heir.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is seen most obviously in the prime ministership of John Howard, her antipodean ideological heir.

auth_sentence.content: What I could really do with now is a large glass of something red and antipodean.
